## addm variable

Add-multiply: (a + b) \* c. All must be of same type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addm: <A extends Prim, B extends A, C extends B>(a: Term<A>, b: Term<B>, c: Term<C>) => Term<A>
```
